sentences.sContent: Impressionism has long been one of the most popular art movements.

words.tran: 感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
印象派的；印象主义的；给人深刻印象的
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想

trans.tranOther: Impressionism is a style of painting developed in France between 1870 and 1900 that concentrated on showing the effects of light and colour rather than on clear and exact detail
